welcome_message_body: Welcome to Montigny-en-Gohelle, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Bon voyage!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kortrijk Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
